overview: Kyle Kekelis is the Vice President of Quality Assurance of Quosap. Kyle ensures that the service delivered to the customer either exceeds or meets all of Quosap’s highest standards. He works with the Product Development and Business team to identify customer’s requirements and drives their implementation into Quosap’s service. Kyle is currently a Quality Engineer at Bloom Energy, a fuel cell company in the Silicon Valley. Kyle manages the Failure Analysis department and works with the product development team to implement and test resolutions. Kyle earned his BS in Mechanical Engineering from UC Berkeley.
